== Thondernad (627299) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Thondernad is a village in the [[Mananthavady]] taluka of [[Wayanad]] district with an area of 9516 hectares and harbouring 2652 households with total population of 11752 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kalpetta]] is at a distance of 48 km. Male population is 5882 and female population is 5870. Scheduled Caste Population is 215 and Scheduled Tribes population is 3101. Census Location Code of the village is 627299<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
